Name: Diplomat
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Wonderfully aromatic and dry. More of an aperitivo than a digestivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . The Diplomat also notably appears in Patrick Gavin Duffy's 1934 The Official Mixer's Manual .
Nutrition: One serving of Diplomat contains 128 calories
